meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>soil</kanji> of the <kanji>earth</kanji> is the portion of the earth that is made up of <vocabulary>land</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: The reading is the on'yomi reading, but 土 gets modified to と for some reason. Just remember that the land you're standing on is made of <reading>toe</reading>s... millions of them. Yuck.
